title: Gorgeous Luxury 2 BR Apt in Backbay of Boston nr Charles River!
posting_body: Call or Text Jennifer @ 617-888-3343  ID#301286424  Avail NOW!!
Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water, Water
This Stunning Luxurious 2 Bedroom, 1-1/2 Bath Apartment is located in a prime location in the Backbay on Beacon Street in a beautiful neighborhood and steps away from the Charles River !
Heat and hot water is included !
This Luxury Apartment offers the following:
o Beautiful Living Room/ Dining Area-
Open Floorplan with gorgeous Chandelier Lighting and10 ft Ceilings!
o. Modern Kitchen with Granite Countertops and Stainless Steel Appliances and Custom Cabinetry!
o Apartment offers Central AC and Heat  and has  a beautiful decorative Fireplace in Living Room!
o Gleaming Hardwood Floors throughout Unit
o Unit showcases a Lower Level with (2) beautiful Bedrooms and a gorgeous Bathroom
o Apartment also features plenty of Windows throughout and Recessed Lighting and lots of Closets!
o Entry of the building gives you a welcoming feel with its gorgeous luxurious look!
o Apt also has a private Entrance way direct into the Unit
Apartment features the perfect location in the Backbay of Boston !
o ½ mile from Copley Square, .8 mile from the Boston Commons & Boston Public Gardens
o Steps from the Charles River and its beautiful view of the City
o Convenient walk to the Prudential Center and its famous Skywalk Observatory
o Great Convenience to get anywhere in the great City of Boston!
Deposits of 1st Month, Last Month and Brokers Fee is requested and Great Credit !
The advertised price & availability must be confirmed at the time of showing.
